title: Crossenvale stories : Digital Storytelling project
brief_description: Eight residents of the Crossendale estate in Echuca in Northern Victoria share their personal stories as part of a Digital Storytelling workshop. While the subjects vary, the topic is mostly centred around the things that lie closest to the participants’ hearts.
description: Eight residents of the Crossendale estate in Echuca in Northern Victoria share their personal stories as part of a Digital Storytelling workshop. While the subjects vary, the topic is mostly centred around the things that lie closest to the participants’ hearts.
